Texts.Chs: 把^orange;电弧冶炼炉^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Arc Smelter^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干的不错，这真是让我对你刮目相看，还有这是我承诺给你的奖励:^orange;很多很多的像素^reset;
Texts.Eng: Fantastic work! Truly amazing. As promised, your reward: ^orange;lots of money^reset;

Texts.Chs: 有一个造价昂贵，但^green;功能强大^reset;的高科技物品，名叫^orange;电弧冶炼炉^reset;。这个工具将大大提升你的金属加工能力。你可以在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中制造它，然后把它带给我，我会给你应得的奖励。
Texts.Eng: There is an expensive but ^green;very powerful^reset; piece of technology called an ^orange;arc smelter^reset; which will increase smelting yields a great deal. Prove you can ^orange;build one^reset; with your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and I'll toss you a bonus.
